paragrafi.nomeParagrafo: Estrae i messaggi di errore associati ad action fallite per un certo account
paragrafi.codicePlSql:
select a.* from fault a, fault_doc b 
where b.id=a.document_id 
and a.action_id  in 
(
select c.id from request a , detail b ,action c 
where b.root_id=a.root_id and 
--b.value='69553034574' and b.name='transaction_id'
b.value ='556023903' and b.name='id_billing_account_rc'
and c.request_id=a.id
and c.status='FA'
)
